channel.title: Gaming on Safi's Tech Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Gaming on Safi's Tech Journal

item.title: One of my favorite FOSS(Free and Open Source Software) game Scorched 3D
item.description: Scorched 3D is a turn-based 3D artillery game inspired by the old MS-DOS title of Scorched Earth. The game has existed for a long time but it is an extremely addictive game.

item.title: How to run SuperTuxKart properly on your Pi4/400 with Raspberry Pi OS Bullseye (64-bit)
item.description: How to run SuperTux Kart properly without the missing graphics on Raspberry Pi OS Bullseye (64-bit) running on Raspberry Pi 4 and Raspberry Pi 400.
